type Style = class inherit Component interface IStateManager

summary.span: 表示 Web 服务器控件的样式。

span.span: Represents the style of a Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装控制 Web 服务器控件外观的属性，可将这些属性应用于多个 Web 服务器控件以提供常见的外观。The class encapsulates the properties that control the appearance of a Web server control and can be applied to multiple Web server controls to provide a common appearance. 您可以分别通过设置和属性来指定控件的背景色和字体 颜色 。You can specify the background color and font color of a control by setting the and properties, respectively. 对于可以显示边框的控件，可以通过设置 、和属性来控制边框宽度、边框样式和边框颜色 。On controls that can display a border, you can control the border width, the border style, and the border color by setting the , , and properties. 还可以使用和属性指定 Web 服务器控件的大小 。The size of a Web server control can also be specified by using the and properties. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 对象同时更改多个控件的样式属性。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次 更改属性值之一时，每个控件都必须调用其 方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持特定属性，则当属性值发生更改时，控件的外观将不会更改。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 对象同时更改多个控件的样式属性。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次 更改属性值之一时，每个控件都必须调用其 方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持特定属性，则当属性值发生更改时，控件的外观将不会更改。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在客户端上呈现 Web 服务器控件的特性和样式，通常需要调用 和 方法将每个特性和样式分别插入到 输出流中。To render attributes and styles for a Web server control on the client, you typically call the and methods to insert each attribute and style individually to the output stream. 若要简化此过程，此方法会将所有对和方法的调用封装到 与 Web 服务器控件关联的每个特性和样式。To simplify the process, this method encapsulates all calls to the and methods for every attribute and style associated with the Web server control. 所有属性和样式都 在单个方法调用中插入到输出流中。All attributes and styles are inserted into the output stream in a single method call.

summary.span: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

span.span: This method is primarily used by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在客户端上呈现 Web 服务器控件的特性和样式，通常需要调用 和 方法将每个特性和样式分别插入到 输出流中。To render attributes and styles for a Web server control on the client, you typically call the and methods to insert each attribute and style individually to the output stream. 若要简化此过程，此方法会将所有对和方法的调用封装到 与 Web 服务器控件关联的每个特性和样式。To simplify the process, this method encapsulates all calls to the and methods for every attribute and style associated with the Web Server control. 所有属性和样式都 在单个方法调用中插入到输出流中。All attributes and styles are inserted into the output stream in a single method call. 此方法通常由派生类中的控件开发人员重写，以将相应的特性和样式插入到 类的输出流中。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建从类派生的类 。The following example demonstrates how to create a class that derives from the class. 重写方法的基实现以添加适用于输出流中的派生类的特性 。The base implementation of the method is overridden to add attributes appropriate to the derived class in the output stream. summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the Web server control.

value.span: 表示控件背景色的 。

span.span: A that represents the background color of the control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 属性指定 Web 服务器控件的背景色。Use the property to specify the background color of the Web server control. 使用对象设置此属性 。This property is set using a object. > [!NOTE] > 此属性将仅为某些控件呈现。This property will render only for certain controls. 例如，、、、 和 将呈现此属性。For example, , , , , and will render this property. 如果其 `RepeatLayout` 属性为 `RepeatLayout.Table` ， `RepeatLayout.Flow` 则它也适用于，而不适用于。It will also work for , and if their `RepeatLayout` property is `RepeatLayout.Table`, and not `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 通常，仅呈现为标记的控件 `` 可以在 html 3.2 中显示背景色，而在 html 4.0 中几乎可以使用任何控件。In general, only controls that render as a `
` tag can display a background color in HTML 3.2, whereas almost any control can in HTML 4.0.对于呈现为 `` 标记 (包括 、所有验证控件以及将其属性设置为) 的列表控件的控件， `RepeatLayout` `RepeatLayout.Flow` 此属性将在 microsoft internet explorer 版本5或更高版本中运行，但不适用于 microsoft internet explorer 版本4。For controls that render as a `` tag (including , all validation controls, and list controls with their `RepeatLayout` property set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`), this property will work in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 or later, but not for Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 对象同时更改多个控件的样式属性。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次 更改属性值之一时，每个控件都必须调用其 方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持特定属性，则当属性值发生更改时，控件的外观将不会更改。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 Web 服务器控件的边框颜色。Use the property to specify the border color of the Web server control. 使用对象设置此属性 。This property is set using a object. > [!NOTE] > 此属性将仅为某些控件呈现。This property will render only for certain controls. 例如，、、、 和 将呈现此属性。For example, , , , , and will render this property. 如果其 `RepeatLayout` 属性为， `RepeatLayout.Table` 则它还适用于、和 `RepeatLayout.Flow` 。It will also work for , , and if their `RepeatLayout` property is `RepeatLayout.Table` and not `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 但是，它将呈现为 `bordercolor` 属性，这可能不适用于所有浏览器。However, it is rendered as the `bordercolor` attribute, which may not work in all browsers. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 对象同时更改多个控件的样式属性。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次 更改属性值之一时，每个控件都必须调用其 方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持特定属性，则当属性值发生更改时，控件的外观将不会更改。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::BorderStyle BorderStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::BorderStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::BorderStyle value); };
member this.BorderStyle : System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的边框样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of the Web server control.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 Web 服务器控件的边框样式。Use the property to specify the border style for the Web server control. 使用枚举值之一设置此属性 。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |边框样式Border Style|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置边框样式。The border style is not set.| |`None`|无边框No border| |`Dotted`|虚线边框。A dotted line border.| |`Dashed`|点划线边框。A dashed line border.| |`Solid`|实线边框。A solid line border.| |`Double`|实线双线边框。A solid double line border.| |`Groove`|用于凹陷边框外观的凹槽状边框。A grooved border for a sunken border appearance.| |`Ridge`|用于凸起边框外观的突起边框。A ridged border for a raised border appearance.| |`Inset`|用于凹陷控件外观的内嵌边框。An inset border for a sunken control appearance.| |`Outset`|用于凸起控件外观的外嵌边框。An outset border for a raised control appearance.| > [!NOTE] > 此属性不会在某些浏览器中呈现。This property will not render on some browsers. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 对象同时更改多个控件的样式属性。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次 更改属性值之一时，每个控件都必须调用其 方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持特定属性，则当属性值发生更改时，控件的外观将不会更改。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 服务器控件的边框宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the border width of the Web server control.

value.span: ，表示 Web 服务器控件的边框宽度。

span.span: A that represents the border width of a Web server control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可指定控件的边框宽度。Use the property to specify a border width for a control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不适用于所有 Web 服务器控件。This property does not work with all Web server controls. 它仅适用于显示为表的控件，例如 和 。It only applies to controls that display as a table, such as and . 此属性是使用对象设置的 。This property is set with a object. 如果 的属性 包含负数，则会引发异常。If the property of the contains a negative number, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 对于早于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本5的浏览器，边框宽度只能用像素表示。The border width can only be expressed in pixels for browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5. Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本5及更高版本支持所有单元类型。All unit types are supported in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 and later. 有关详细信息，请参阅特定控件。Refer to the specific control for details. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 对象同时更改多个控件的样式属性。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次 更改属性值之一时，每个控件都必须调用其 方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持特定属性，则当属性值发生更改时，控件的外观将不会更改。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/CS/styleclasscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[StyleClass#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StyleClass/VB/styleclassvb.aspx#3)]

exception.span: 指定的边框宽度是负值。

span.span: The specified border width is a negative value.

summary.span: 将指定 的样式属性复制到从中调用此方法的 类的实例。

span.span: Duplicates the style properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法将指定的样式属性复制 到 从中调用此方法的类的实例。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from. 当使用注册某个样式 ，然后使用复制该样式时， 只会将该 属性复制到目标，而不是所有的单个属性。When a style is registered using , and then copied using , only the property is copied to the destination, not all the individual properties. 如果你随后复制或检查目标样式的属性，这可能会导致意外的结果。This could lead to unexpected results if you then copy or examine the properties of the destination style. 例如，如果使用从已注册的的 属性复制字体信息 ，则不会从样式中获取字体的各个设置。For example, if you are using to copy font information from the property of a that is registered, you will not get the individual settings of the font from the style. > [!CAUTION] > 所有属性（包括在类的当前实例中设置的属性） 将由参数指定的中的关联属性替换 `s` 。All properties, including those that have been set in the current instance of the class, will be replaced by the associated property in the specified by the `s` parameter.

span.span: has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定要在 Web 服务器控件的客户端上呈现的 CSS 类。Use the property to specify the CSS class to render on the client for the Web server control. 此属性将在所有控件的浏览器中呈现。This property will render on browsers for all controls. 无论浏览器是什么，它都将始终呈现为 `class` 属性。It will always be rendered as the `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. 例如，假设您具有以下 Web 服务器控件声明：For example, suppose you have the following Web server control declaration: ``` ``` 在以前的 Web 服务器控件声明的客户端上呈现以下 HTML：The following HTML is rendered on the client for the previous Web server control declaration: ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 在不支持 CSS 的浏览器中，设置 属性将不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property will have no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 Web 服务器控件的字体属性。Use the property to specify the font properties of the Web server control. 此属性包括子属性，可在 `Property-Subproperty` (例如 `Font-Bold`) 或以 (格式（例如) ）的形式以编程方式访问 `Property.Subproperty` `Font.Bold` 。This property includes subproperties that can be accessed declaratively in the form of `Property-Subproperty` (for example `Font-Bold`) or programmatically in the form of `Property.Subproperty` (for example `Font.Bold`). 除了一个子属性，所有控件都将在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本4之前的浏览器中呈现。All but one subproperty will render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls. 它们分别为： 、 、 、 、 、 和 (，但只有命名字体大小（例如 `Small` 、 `Smaller` 等）才能) 。They are: , , , , , , and (but only named font sizes, such as `Small`, `Smaller`, and so on, will work). > [!NOTE] > 尽管这些子属性是在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本4之前的浏览器中呈现的，但呈现的 HTML 不同于更高版本的浏览器。Although these subproperties render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4, the HTML that is rendered is different than in later browsers. 这些子属性将呈现为 HTML 元素（例如和），而不是呈现为样式特性 `` `` 。Instead of rendering as style attributes, these subproperties are rendered as HTML elements, such as `` and ``. 在某些浏览器中不会呈现的一个子属性是 。One subproperty that will not render on some browsers is . ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 对象同时更改多个控件的样式属性。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次 更改属性值之一时，每个控件都必须调用其 方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持特定属性，则当属性值发生更改时，控件的外观将不会更改。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 Web 服务器控件的前景色。Use the property to specify the foreground color of the Web server control. 前景色通常是文本的颜色。The foreground color is usually the color of the text. 对于除、和之外的所有控件，此属性将在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本4之前的浏览器中呈现 。This property will render on browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls, except the , , and . > [!NOTE] > 在不支持样式的浏览器中，此属性呈现为 FONT 元素。On browsers that do not support styles, this property is rendered as a FONT element. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 对象同时更改多个控件的样式属性。This example demonstrates how to use a object to change the style properties of multiple controls at once. 每次 更改属性值之一时，每个控件都必须调用其 方法。Each time one of the property values changes, each control must call its method. 请注意，并非所有包含的控件都支持演示的所有属性。Note that not all the controls included support all the properties demonstrated. 如果控件不支持特定属性，则当属性值发生更改时，控件的外观将不会更改。If a control does not support a particular property, the appearance of the control will not change when the property value is changed. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)).
